reviewText: Although it was a little slow moving in some parts it turned out to be a good movie which is based on a true story,  Its about a man who saved himself from alcoholism and went on to be a very successful businessman and millionaire who uses a lot of his money to help others.
Title: Deep in the Heart

reviewText: I am still impressed with this movie! It provides the viewer with a clear picture of satan's destruction in a person's life, as the scripture says " the thief cometh but to steal, kill, and destroy, but Jesus came that we might have life and that more abundantly.when Mr. Champion turned to GOD for his answers to the problems in his life, he received the GOD kind of turn around that only GOD could have given him and his family even in the midst of trials!In my opinion, this is a winner of a movie
Title: Deep in the Heart

reviewText: Good Story Line. The wonders and challenges that moves people in the right path of life that makes life worth living.
Title: Deep in the Heart

reviewText: This give me new hope that my husband can pull it all together with God help. And yes I would tell other about this movie. I have already share it with my pastor and a teacher and her family.
Title: Deep in the Heart

reviewText: A little detail....... when you watch this flick...which is a very good flick.... you might notice the camera always did close-ups on Val.As much as Val wanted to look like Jesus... I just can't imagine Jesus weighing in at over 300 lbs!!!Otherwise, this video was professionally done; near perfect editing, dialog and filming really professional.  It is such a good thing Christian movie-making has become professional instead of well-meaning church-goers who use their home video cameras to make a "movie"...I digress.........the acting is very natural and the actors all fit in with what they needed to do.  The movie is thought provoking and warms the heart.  Everything fit in it's place at the right time.  This is NOT a "holy-roller" film.  It is good Christian movie making and it is well done....Just don't expect Val to be in every frame..
summary: Val was not the star of this thing................
Title: Deep in the Heart

reviewText: This message has a very strong message to get across to its viewers and although it seems harsh, it was spoken in truth! This movie will help many who need help with addiction & the only true help comes from God!
Title: Deep in the Heart
